title: Part construction: Where the whole or part of building is demolished or altered or reconstructed/removed, except where otherwise specifically stipulated, these Regulations shall apply only to the extent of the work involved
clause_text: Part construction: Where the whole or part of building is demolished or altered or reconstructed/removed, except where otherwise specifically stipulated, these Regulations shall apply only to the extent of the work involved.
